item.title: Cinder on DevStack - Quick Start
item.description: This blog post covers all the important commands for OpenStack Cinder - The block storage project. Although this guide is written based on DevStack, it will work with actual deployment of OpenStack cloud also (except the DevStack/Linux specific bits).
